alert.note: Alert for Sherburne; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 6:56PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hennepin, east central Wright, northwestern Anoka and southeastern Sherburne Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 655 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Corcoran, or 11 miles southeast of Buffalo, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Maple Grove and Corcoran around 705 PM CDT. St. Michael, Otsego, Rogers and Albertville around 715 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Andover, Ramsey, Elk River and St. Francis. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 202 and 205. U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 210 and 217. U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 159 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
